segments.text: Why are you asking me about my boyfriend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Brad from school asked me out just today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don't know what to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean you've never had a boyfriend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mom says no boyfriend until I'm in college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , that's what a lot of parents in Taiwan say to their kids .
segments.speaker: S2
